title: I made a request that got accept
body:
Hello Riot :) I made a PBE request that got accepted the 2016/11/07 thanks :) but ive just saw it right now and now that the pbe are close i cant create an account even if i got accepted so thats a little bit frustrating cause i want to play whit my friend on pbe and test new patch but i cant. So can you help me whit this? 

Thanks alot.

Killer

replies.body: I already made one :) but still no answer

Hmmmmm I'm not 100% sure if we'll be able to get that account made or not now that the signups have been closed. Go ahead and reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you'd like with that email so that our account agents can see what can be done!
